subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Evp isnt just one or two words anymore!
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
Some are yes, they will be marked with REV in the file name. I find messages on both sides of the sweep sessions.

Misty


--- On Sat, 8/16/08, threadsintyme@... <Threadsintyme@...> wrote:

> From: threadsintyme@... <Threadsintyme@...>
> Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Evp isnt just one or two words anymore!
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Date: Saturday, August 16, 2008, 1:14 PM
> Your recordings sound as if they are being played in
> reverse, rather than in the normal foward mode.
> Al
> 
> 
> 
> Not sure it ever was. I had a good group session the other
> day so 
> thought I would share some of what came thru with the
> online crowd. A 
> few are too long sentence wise to post here so I stuck them
> in my 
> esnips account. They were pretty well spoken (for my ears)
> and I was 
> pleasantly surprised at the depth of the messages that came
> thru.
